mapper.select: select coalesce(brand_id,0) as brand_id from brand_user_role where user_id in (select user_id from brand_user_role where brand_id=#{id}) and c_type=1

select sum(case when c_type=1 then 1 else 0 end) as macNum,sum(case when c_type=1 then 1 else 0 end) as agentNum,sum(1) as num from brand_basic_infor tab_bas where tab_bas.id in ( select brand_id from sys_user tab_a,brand_user_role tab_b where tab_a.id=tab_b.user_id and tab_a.c_type=tab_b.c_type)
